"""
        Test PBcount on with the --first-residue option and a negative value.
        """
input_files = ['count_multi1.PB.fasta', 'count_multi2.PB.fasta',
    'count_multi3.PB.fasta']
output = 'output'
reference = 'count_multi123_first-20.PB.count'
self._run_program_and_validate(tmpdir, reference, input_files=input_files,
    output=output, first_residue=-20)
